title: New: Jessie Reyez – Phone Calls
body:
**Jessie Reyez** has become one of the breakout stars of this year, with a her debut EP, Kiddo, released earlier this year, and racking up over 30million Spotify streams to date.

Set to appear on a whole host of 2018 tips list, she’s recently shared her latest single, _Phone Calls_, another slice of personality driven R&B. Taking aim at parts of the industry that she’s so quickly conquered, it’s a true sign of a star on the rise. Check it out below.
